text: Nils Åman (born 7 February 2000) is a Swedish professional ice hockey centre for the Abbotsford Canucks of the American Hockey League (AHL) as a prospect under contract to the Vancouver Canucks of the National Hockey League (NHL). He was drafted by the Colorado Avalanche in the sixth round of the 2020 NHL Entry Draft with the 167th overall pick. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Colorado Avalanche Category:Swedish ice hockey centres Category:Vancouver Canucks players
title: Nils Åman
